Interface SidebarControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ManagerSidebarController, TechnicianSidebarController
public interface SidebarControllerInterface
Interface for sidebar controllers in the application. Provides methods for setting the main controller and selecting buttons in the sidebar.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    selectButton(String buttonId)
    Selects a button in the sidebar based on the given button ID.
    void
    setMainController(ViewManagerController controller)
    Sets the main controller for managing views.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      void setMainController(ViewManagerController controller)
      Sets the main controller for managing views.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main view manager controller to be set.

    • selectButton

      void selectButton(String buttonId)
      Selects a button in the sidebar based on the given button ID. Highlights the selected button to indicate the active view.
      Parameters:
      buttonId - The ID of the button to be selected.
